transcript:
Customer: Ye to sach hai ke bhagwan hai hai magar phir
Executive: Hello
Customer: Good morning sir Abhishek baat kar raha hu Indiamart se.
Executive: Ha ji kya haal hai sir?
Customer: Ha sir badhiya hai sir aap bataiye sir kaise hai?
Executive: Badhiya badhiya.
Executive: Ji aapne call kiya tha sir 9696 pe bataye kya koi dikkat aa rahi hai sir?
Customer: Actually sir mera na jo main phone mein login kar raha hu na.
Executive: Ha.
Customer: Na to mujhe by lead mil rahi hai.
Customer: Na hi wo lead manager wala option show ho raha hai sir.
Customer: Yahi dikkat aa rahi hai abhi.
Executive: Ha.
Executive: Achcha to aap login kaha se kar rahe hai abhi?
Customer: Phone phone mein kar raha hu sir.
Executive: Phone se kar rahe hai matlab Indiamart app mein?
Customer: Ha ji ha ji.
Executive: Achcha achcha theek hai main ek baar check kar deta hu aapko dekho Indiamart jo app hai usme aapko manage leads ka option aata hoga matlab lead manager ka direct naam se option aata to hai sir.
Customer: Nahi aata to hai jaise usme show hoti thi na leads.
Executive: Hmm.
Customer: Ab usme dikh raha hi kuch nahi hai usme aa raha hai web page not available.
Executive: Web page not available.
Executive: Ha just give me a second let me check first sir kyuki ho sakta hai kuch bug chal raha ho jiski wajah se kya aisa kuch bug nahi chal raha main ek baar check kar leta hu.
Customer: Actually sir teen char din ho gaye maine tab maine socha maine bhi socha koi server mein down ho.
Executive: Ha kai baar hota hai kya hai main check kar leta hu. Wo to ye teen char din se aa raha hai.
Executive: Achcha to laptop pe ya desktop pe on karne ki koshish kiya sir aapne?
Customer: Laptop to ab office mein jaake hi kar sakta hu.
Executive: Achcha achcha. Office kitne time pahuchte ho aap?
Customer: Office mein sir mere ko abhi time lag jayega.
Executive: Time lag jayega to koi issue nahi hai. Let's main dekh raha tha aap thoda service kam use kar rahe the sir. Isi wajah se?
Customer: Ha.
Executive: Isi wajah se kam use kar pa rahe the aap?
Customer: Ha ji ha ji sir.
Executive: Achcha lead manager dekho maine apna aapka web app pe open kiya na jo kya bolte hai aapka seller panel jo hota hai laptop wala. Theek hai laptop pe. Ha web version aapka maine open kiya hai. Maine account to zaroor aaya lekin aapka lead manager pe aap option show ho raha hai. Ek baar Indiamart ka app mein jo aapko dikh raha hai na option jab aap open karenge Indiamart ka app waha pe right side mein aapke naam ke left mein three lines honge us pe click karke aap mujhe uska screenshot de sakte hai?
Customer: Kya kar sakte hai?
Executive: Uska screen shot.
Customer: Ha bhej sakta hu.
Executive: To ek baar ye call pe reh ke ek baar bhej dijiye sir mujhe. Ab mai high karu ha. Mai high kar raha hu number boliye sir aapne 700.
Customer: 700.
Executive: 700 64 64 39 39 432 432
Executive: Bhejiye.
Executive: Dekho high maine likha hai uska reply kar do sir. High send.
Executive: Ya. Ab maine ispe kya kya bhejna hai sir maine isko screenshot?
Executive: Screenshot jo aapka app hai Indiamart ka na isko open kijiye pehle. Ek minute sir. Ha.
Customer: Indiamart open kiye kya sir?
Executive: Ha. Usme aapka jo upar naam dikh raha hai na?
Customer: Naam dikh raha hai ha Vikas. Uske left mein aapko option mil rahe honge like three dot wali three dot ki lines hai ha hamburger sign is pe click kijiye.
Executive: Ab waha pe aapko jo options aa rahe hai na sare iska screenshot agar le paye to bhej dijiye.
Customer: Bhejiye screenshot ho raha hai?
Customer: Ha kar liya. Ha ye mujhe yahi whatsapp pe bhejiye na.
Customer: Dekho maine aapko bhej diya sir.
Executive: Correct. Lead manager dekhiye aapko jo option hai na ye dikh raha hoga ki sabse upar jo 99 plus likha hai na lead manager ke bagal mein lead manager pura. Ha. Lead manager. Lead manager. Is pe click kijiye. Ha yahi hai aapka lead manager isme by leads nahi aati hai isme wo aate hai by leads lead manager wala ab dekho maine aapko na lead manager mein jab main jata hu na. Hmm. Ab main ab main aapko ek aur screenshot bhej raha hu wahi wahi sabse aa raha hai teen din char din ho gaye.
Executive: Achcha achcha bhejiye bhejiye sir.
Customer: Maine aapko bhej diya dekho yahi aa raha hai aa raha hai.
Executive: Web page not available.
Executive: Okay achcha ek baar main request karunga agar aap chrome pe open karke seller panel open karke ek baar check kar sako to. Ha. Chrome par chrome open kijiye apna browser. Open kiya chrome open kar diya. Ha agar aap comfortable ho available ho abhi mobile se bhi connect kar sakte ho to video meet mein main connect kar lu sir. Kya hai main zyada aasani se guide kar paunga instead of ki screenshot baar baar bhej bhej kar. Video meet pe connect kar lenge kar lenge sir mobile se hi ho jayega. Ha ha kar lo sir. Theek hai main dekho link bheja hai aapka jo primary email id hai is pe receive hua hai. Mere naam se aayi. Mere naam se hi aayega sir check kijiye aaya. Whatsapp mein ki hai. Ha nahi whatsapp pe nahi kiya whatsapp pe karu kya. Mail pe. Ha mail pe kiya hai abhi maine whatsapp pe nahi karna sir. Nahi kaun si wo kaun si mail pe kiya aapne kis naam se hai? Naam naam se aayega mere Abhishek Soni aur meri kaun si mail pe kiya aapne? Wo main bata raha hu. Aapki jo mail id hai ye hai gangaenterprisesbm@gmail.com. BC wali hai aapke paas? Nahi nahi BC wali aap bata do us pe bhej deta hu sir. Agar comfortable ho whatsapp pe bhej whatsapp pe bhej do sir. BC Sharma. Isko cancel karna padega mujhe just give me a second. Ye wali maine cancel ki dobara se connect kar raha hu. Ab bataiye sir. BC Sharma spelling bataiye sir sorry. Maine aapko na whatsapp kar diya sir. Whatsapp kar diya ye sahi rahega.
Executive: Theek hai maine bhej diya sir check kijiye.
Executive: Aap jis vyakti se baat kar rahe hai unhone aapke call ko hold par rakha hai. Kripya line par bane rahe. The person you are speaking with has put your call on hold. Please stay on the line. Aap jis vyakti se baat kar rahe hai.
summary:
Concerns:

- Not receiving buyleads in the app.

- Lead manager option not showing in app.

- Web page not available error in lead manager.



Resolution:

- Executive checked the customer's web app.

- Asked customer to share screenshot of app.

- Executive sent a video meet link to customer.

- Executive sent a WhatsApp message to customer.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will check the issue.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, lead manager, app, webpage, screenshot
